nodes.label: Pulse-Based Health Monitoring
nodes.description: Active health monitoring via heartbeats. Traditional process monitoring tells you IF a process exists. Pulse tells you HOW WELL it's running. Processes send pulses at intervals; monitors track timing and detect degradation before failure.

nodes.label: Train the World, Not the Agent
nodes.description: The paradigm shift: instead of making agents smarter at navigating messy reality, make reality (the model) complete enough that navigation is trivial. An agent in a well-modeled world needs no training - it simply reads and understands.

nodes.label: The Model IS the World
nodes.description: The model is not a map of reality - it is reality. When you change the model, you change the world. When reality drifts from the model, reality is wrong, not the model.

nodes.label: The Seed Philosophy
nodes.description: Don't train your agent, train your world. Instead of building smarter agents that navigate chaos, build complete worlds (models) where everything is instantly known, understood, and workable. The transformation: from 'agent discovers files' to 'agent wakes up in a world'. This is the root aspiration.

nodes.label: Instant Context
nodes.description: An agent reading the model should instantly understand everything - structure, relationships, intent, state. No discovery phase. No file searching. No exploration. The model IS the understanding.

nodes.label: Model Contains Reality
nodes.description: The model doesn't describe reality - it contains it. Source references with hashes embed actual artifacts. The model is not documentation of the world, it IS the world.

nodes.label: Model Everything
nodes.description: All systems the user works with should be modeled in seed. Every project, every tool, every workflow. The model is the universal interface to all realities.

nodes.label: Regenerable Reality
nodes.description: If the model is complete enough, physical artifacts become disposable projections. Delete the code, regenerate from model. The model is the source, reality is the render.

nodes.label: Single Source of Truth
nodes.description: The model is THE truth. Not a reflection of truth, not documentation of truth - the actual truth. All changes flow through the model. Reality follows.
